document.full_text: tokyo electric power co.  plans to sell its shares in kddi corp  to help pay for compensation costs stemming from the disaster at its fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, a newspaper reported on sunday.
document.title: tokyo electric to sell kddi shares for nuclear
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co.  plans to sell its shares in kddi corp  to help pay for compensation costs stemming from the disaster at its fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, a newspaper reported on sunday.
